summary:
Replaces Dawnguard vampire armors with mini versions.
Adds craftable vampire armors, gauntlets, and boots with color variations.
Optional file InvisibleSeranaHood.esp hides her hood.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces dawnguard vampire armors with mini versions (except for Valerica's armor).
Adds 4 color variations for the royal armors, 2 color variations for the gauntlets and the boots.
They are craftable at a forge (LEATHER category).
[line][heading]Requirement[/heading]
Dawnguard
[line][heading]Installation[/heading]
Via any mod manager or manually merge into the data folder and activate the esp file(s).

[Optional files]
Invisible Serana Hood : Hides Serana's hood.
Version LQ : Contains compressed low quality textures.
[line][heading]Credits[/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/537675]dimon99[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/979887]Halofarm (Halo's mods)[/url]
[line]
